title: (x) square sans on Burial "Untrue" CD cover - Agency {Akira}
content:
Here it is (I can't upload due to work firewall).

[http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51Gag4JzSxL.\_SS500\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418230511/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51Gag4JzSxL._SS500_.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51Gag4JzSxL.\_SS500\_.jpg")

It also reminds me of the type used in the Halo 3 menu system - is it the same?
author: ngchol
